property.value: {ABYSS RUSH} You may summon this creature from your graveyard. If you do, this creature can attack players this turn and is put on the bottom of your deck at the end of the turn. {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When this creature leaves, Abyss Mechraid 8. property.name: Race
property.value: Abyss Royale

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Your Abyss creatures in your graveyard get "Abyss Rush". (You may summon a creature that has "Abyss Rush" from your graveyard. If you do, that creature can attack players this turn and is put on the bottom of your deck at the end of the turn.) ■ When this creature would leave, you may discard 2 cards from your hand instead. ■ Your creatures in your graveyard cost 2 less to summon. They can't cost 0 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {ABYSS RUSH} You may summon this creature from your graveyard. If you do, this creature can attack players this turn and is put on the bottom of your deck at the end of the turn. {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature taps, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your graveyard. Choose up to 2 of your opponent's creatures that cost less than the total cost of those 2 cards and destroy them. TWINPACT ■ Return up to 2 Abyss creatures from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules1
Rules2
property.value: ■ Return up to 2 Abyss creatures from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Super Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DM23-SP1 Start WIN Super Deck: Abyssbell Rush

property.name: Race
property.value: Abyss Royale

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SLAYER} (Whenever this creature battles, destroy the other creature after the battle.) ■ When you put this creature, look at your opponent's hand and discard a creature from it. ■ 'Civil Count 3': Whenever this creature attacks, if you have a total of 3 or more darkness creatures and/or darkness tamaseeds, you may choose a card in your opponent's graveyard. You may use one of that card's "when you put" abilities. Then your opponent puts that card on the bottom of their deck.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Super Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DM23-SP1 Start WIN Super Deck: Abyssbell Rush

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ You may cast this spell from your graveyard, If you do, after you cast, put it on the bottom of your deck instead of your graveyard.. ■Choose 2 of the following. (You may choose the same one twice.): ► Your opponent chooses a card in their hand and discards it: ► Put a darkness creature that costs 4 or less or a darkness aura that costs 4 or less from your graveyard: ► Choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature gets -4000 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Super Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DM23-SP1 Start WIN Super Deck: Abyssbell Rush

property.name: Type
property.value: Tamaseed / Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Abyss Royale/ACE

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this tamaseed, you may put the top 4 cards of your deck into your graveyard. ■ If you don't have a total of 4 or more darkness creatures and/or darkness tamaseeds, this tamaseed isn't treated as a creature in the battle zone. {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature attacks, destroy one of your opponent's creatures. ■ During your turn, this tamaseed can't leave except by being destroyed.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Super Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DM23-SP1 Start WIN Super Deck: Abyssbell Rush

property.name: Race
property.value: Abyss Royale

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ When you put this creature, your opponent chooses one of their creatures that has the lowest power and destroys it. ■ 'Civil Count 3': When you put this creature, if you have a total of 3 or more darkness creatures and/or darkness tamaseeds, your opponent chooses one of their creatures that has the highest power and destroys it. ■ When this creature attacks, destroy this creature after the attack.

property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ At the end of your turn, put the top card of your deck into your graveyard. Then you may return a darkness card from your graveyard to your hand. TWINPACT ■ Abyss Mechraid 5. Abyss {MECHRAID} 5 - Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. From among them, you may use a Abyss card that costs 5 or less for no cost. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ When you put this creature, choose one of the following: ► You may put 4 cards in your graveyard on the bottom of your deck in any order. If you do, Abyss Mechraid 8. Abyss {MECHRAID} 8 - Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. From among them, you may use a Abyss card that costs 8 or less for no cost. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order: ► Put the top 4 cards of your deck into your graveyard.
